name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
flavor: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."

name: Auratog
text: Sacrifice an enchantment: Auratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: The auratog enjoys eating its wards.

name: Celestial Dawn
text: Lands you control are Plains.\nNonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield, spells you control, and nonland permanents you control are white.\nYou may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

name: Consecrate Land
text: Enchant land\nEnchanted land has indestructible and can't be enchanted by other Auras.

name: Defiant Vanguard
text: When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn.\n{5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Disenchant
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Enduring Renewal
text: Play with your hand revealed.\nIf you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card.\nWhenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.

name: Essence Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.
flavor: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

name: Honorable Passage
text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, Honorable Passage deals that much damage to the source's controller.

name: Icatian Javelineers
text: Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it.\n{T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: Icatian Javelineers deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Moorish Cavalry
text: Trample
flavor: Members of the elite Moorish Cavalry are very particular about their mounts, choosing only those whose bloodlines have been pure for generations.

name: Resurrection
text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Sacred Mesa
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus.\n{1}{W}: Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor: "Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves."\n—"Song to the Sun," Femeref song

name: Soltari Priest
text: Protection from red\nShadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."

name: Squire
flavor:
"Of twenty yeer of age he was, I gesse.
Of his stature he was of evene lengthe.
And wonderly delyvere, and of greete strengthe."
—Geoffrey Chaucer,
The Canterbury Tales

name: Valor
text: First strike\nAs long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.
flavor: "The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land."\n—Scroll of Beginnings

name: Witch Hunter
text: {T}: Witch Hunter deals 1 damage to target player.\n{1}{W}{W}, {T}: Return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

name: Zhalfirin Commander
text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)\n{1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground."\n—Sidar Jabari

name: Dandân
text: Dandân can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.\nWhen you control no Islands, sacrifice Dandân.
flavor: "Catch good today. Start replacing crew tomorrow."\n—Faysal al-Mousa, fisher captain, log

name: Flying Men
text: Flying
flavor: Saffiyah clapped her hands and twenty flying men appeared at her side, each well trained in the art of combat.

name: Ghost Ship
text: Flying\n{U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.
flavor: "That phantom prow split the storm as lightning cast its long shadow on the battlefield below."\n—Mireille Gaetane, The Valeriad

name: Giant Oyster
text: You may choose not to untap Giant Oyster during your untap step.\n{T}: For as long as Giant Oyster remains tapped, target tapped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and at the beginning of each of your draw steps, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. When Giant Oyster leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature.

name: Leviathan
text:
Trample
Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

name: Lord of Atlantis
text: Other Merfolk creatures get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

name: Merfolk Assassin
text: {T}: Destroy target creature with islandwalk.

name: Mistform Ultimus
text: Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield).
flavor: It may wear your face, but its mind is its own.

name: Ovinomancer
text: When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand.\n{T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller puts a 0/1 green Sheep creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Pirate Ship
text: Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.\n{T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player.\nWhen you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

name: Prodigal Sorcerer
text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Occasionally, members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

name: Psionic Blast
text: Psionic Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.

name: Sindbad
text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

name: Stormscape Familiar
text: Flying\nWhite spells and black spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: Each Stormscape apprentice must hand-raise and train an owl before attaining the rank of master.

name: Unstable Mutation
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +3/+3.\nAt the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

name: Voidmage Prodigy
text: {U}{U}, Sacrifice a Wizard: Counter target spell.\nMorph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Whispers of the Muse
text: Buyback {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)\nDraw a card.
flavor: "I followed her song only to find it was a dirge."\n—Crovax

name: Willbender
text: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)\nWhen Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

name: Avatar of Woe
text: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast.\nFear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\n{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Bad Moon
text: Black creatures get +1/+1.

name: Conspiracy
text: As Conspiracy enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nCreature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield, creature spells you control, and creatures you control are the chosen type.

name: Darkness
text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor: "If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride, / And hug it in mine arms."\n—William Shakespeare,\nMeasure for Measure

name: Dauthi Slayer
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)\nDauthi Slayer attacks each turn if able.
flavor: "They have knives for every soul."\n—Lyna, Soltari emissary

name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
text: Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.\nEvil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.
flavor: The highway of fear is the shortest route to defeat.

name: Faceless Butcher
text: When Faceless Butcher enters the battlefield, exile target creature other than Faceless Butcher.\nWhen Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Funeral Charm
text:
Choose one —
• Target player discards a card.
• Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn.
• Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

name: Sengir Autocrat
text: When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens onto the battlefield.\nWhen Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.
flavor: "A thankless job, and a death sentence besides."\n—Eron the Relentless

name: Shadow Guildmage
text: {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.\n{R}, {T}: Shadow Guildmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
flavor: To keep the dead so others may live.\n—Shadow Guild maxim

name: Soul Collector
text: Flying\nWhenever a creature dealt damage by Soul Collector this turn dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.\nMorph {B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Stupor
text: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.
flavor: There are medicines for all afflictions but idleness.\n—Suq'Ata saying

name: Swamp Mosquito
text: Flying\nWhenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Twisted Abomination
text: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination.\nSwampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Uncle Istvan
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.
flavor: Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.

name: Undead Warchief
text: Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\nZombie creatures you control get +2/+1.
flavor: It has the strength of seven men. In fact, it used to be seven men.

name: Undertaker
text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The weight of death is heavy but not immovable.

name: Withered Wretch
text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.

name: Avalanche Riders
text: Haste\nEcho {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\nWhen Avalanche Riders enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

name: Browbeat
text: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
flavor: "Even the threat of power has power."\n—Jeska, warrior adept

name: Desolation Giant
text: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

name: Disintegrate
text: Disintegrate deals X damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

name: Dragon Whelp
text: Flying\n{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Dragonstorm
text: Search your library for a Dragon permanent card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.\nStorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

name: Eron the Relentless
text: Haste\n{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate Eron the Relentless.
flavor: "Eron would be much less of a hassle if only he were mortal."\n—Reyhan, Samite alchemist

name: Fiery Temper
text: Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to target creature or player.\nMadness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Fire Whip
text: Enchant creature you control\nEnchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."\nSacrifice Fire Whip: Fire Whip deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

name: Goblin Snowman
text: Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn.\n{T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.
flavor: "Strength in numbers? Right."\n—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

name: Kobold Taskmaster
text: Other Kobold creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor: The taskmaster knows that there is no cure for the common kobold.

name: Orcish Librarian
text: {R}, {T}: Look at the top eight cards of your library. Exile four of them at random, then put the rest on top of your library in any order.
flavor: "Us hungry, need food . . . . Lots of books . . . . Hmm . . . ."

name: Orgg
text: Trample\nOrgg can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.\nOrgg can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.
flavor: It's bigger than it thinks.

name: Pandemonium
text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player of his or her choice.
flavor: "If we cannot live proudly, we die so!"\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Suq'Ata Lancer
text: Haste\nFlanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor: "Never stop 'til you see your lance come out the other side."\n—Telim'Tor

name: Tribal Flames
text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
flavor: "Fire is the universal language."\n—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Uthden Troll
text: {R}: Regenerate Uthden Troll.
flavor:
"Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere,
Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near,
Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh 'n da hurt'll disappear."
—Troll chant

name: Wildfire Emissary
text: Protection from white\n{1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire."\n—Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat

name: Avoid Fate
text: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.

name: Call of the Herd
text: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.\nFlashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Cockatrice
text: Flying\nWhenever Cockatrice blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

name: Craw Giant
text: Trample\nRampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor: Harthag gave a jolly laugh as he surveyed the army before him. "Ho ho ho! Midgets! You think you can stand in my way?"

name: Gaea's Blessing
text: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.\nDraw a card.\nWhen Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

name: Gaea's Liege
text: As long as Gaea's Liege isn't attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. As long as Gaea's Liege is attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests defending player controls.\n{T}: Target land becomes a Forest until Gaea's Liege leaves the battlefield.

name: Hail Storm
text: Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control.
flavor: "If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home."\n—Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

name: Hunting Moa
text: Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\nWhen Hunting Moa enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Jolrael, Empress of Beasts
text: {2}{G}, {T}, Discard two cards: All lands target player controls become 3/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
flavor: "I need no army. I have Jamuraa."

name: Krosan Cloudscraper
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Krosan Cloudscraper unless you pay {G}{G}.\nMorph {7}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Scragnoth
text: Scragnoth can't be countered.\nProtection from blue
flavor: It possesses no intelligence, only counter-intelligence.

name: Spike Feeder
text: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nRemove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

name: Spitting Slug
text: Whenever Spitting Slug blocks or becomes blocked, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn. Otherwise, each creature blocking or blocked by Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Thallid
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid.\nRemove three spore counters from Thallid: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Thornscape Battlemage
text: Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.\nWhen Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

name: Verdeloth the Ancient
text: Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)\nSaproling creatures and other Treefolk creatures get +1/+1.\nWhen Verdeloth the Ancient enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.

name: Wall of Roots
text: Defender\nPut a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.

name: Whirling Dervish
text: Protection from black\nAt the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Coalition Victory
text: You win the game if you control a land of each basic land type and a creature of each color.
flavor: "You can build a perfect machine out of imperfect parts."\n—Urza

name: Fiery Justice
text: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Target opponent gains 5 life.
flavor: "The fire of justice burns like nothing else."\n—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Jasmine Boreal
flavor: "Peace must prevail, even if the wicked must die."

name: Lightning Angel
text: Flying, vigilance, haste

name: Merieke Ri Berit
text: Merieke Ri Berit doesn't untap during your untap step.\n{T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Merieke Ri Berit. When Merieke Ri Berit leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Mystic Enforcer
text: Protection from black\nThreshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Enforcer gets +3/+3 and has flying.

name: Mystic Snake
text: Flash\nWhen Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.
flavor: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

name: Nicol Bolas
text: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nicol Bolas unless you pay {U}{B}{R}.\nWhenever Nicol Bolas deals damage to an opponent, that player discards his or her hand.

name: Shadowmage Infiltrator
text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\nWhenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

name: Sol'kanar the Swamp King
text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)\nWhenever a player casts a black spell, you gain 1 life.

name: Spined Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor: "Slivers are evil and slivers are sly;\nAnd if you get eaten, then no one will cry."\n—Mogg children's rhyme

name: Stormbind
text: {2}, Discard a card at random: Stormbind deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: "Once, our people could call down the storm itself to do our bidding."\n—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

name: Teferi's Moat
text: As Teferi's Moat enters the battlefield, choose a color.\nCreatures of the chosen color without flying can't attack you.
flavor: "Isolation is not the answer."\n—Urza, to Teferi

name: Vhati il-Dal
text: {T}: Until end of turn, target creature has base power 1 or base toughness 1.
flavor: "Sir, I just thought . . . ," explained Vhati.\n"Don't think," interrupted Greven. "It doesn't suit you."

name: Void
text: Choose a number. Destroy all artifacts and creatures with converted mana cost equal to that number. Then target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards with converted mana cost equal to the number.

name: Assault
text: Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

name: Battery
text: Put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

name: Claws of Gix
text: {1}, Sacrifice a permanent: You gain 1 life.
flavor: When the Brotherhood of Gix dug out the cave of Koilos they found their master's severed hand. They enshrined it, hoping that one day it would point the way to Phyrexia.

name: Dodecapod
text: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

name: Feldon's Cane
text: {T}, Exile Feldon's Cane: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
flavor: Feldon found the first of these canes frozen in the Ronom Glacier.

name: Grinning Totem
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.

name: Mindless Automaton
text: Mindless Automaton enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{1}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mindless Automaton.\nRemove two +1/+1 counters from Mindless Automaton: Draw a card.

name: Mirari
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor: "It offers you what you want, not what you need."\n—Braids, dementia summoner

name: The Rack
text: As The Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.\nAt the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in his or her hand.
flavor: Invented in Mishra's earlier days, the rack was once his most feared creation.

name: Serrated Arrows
text: Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.\n{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

name: Tormod's Crypt
text: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
flavor: The dark opening seemed to breathe the cold, damp air of the dead earth in a steady rhythm.

name: War Barge
text: {3}: Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. When War Barge leaves the battlefield this turn, destroy that creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated. (A creature with islandwalk can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

name: Arena
text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice he or she controls. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Desert
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the end of combat step.

name: Gemstone Mine
text: Gemstone Mine enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it.\n{T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

name: Pendelhaven
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: "This is the forest primeval. The murmuring pines and the hemlocks . . . Stand like Druids of eld."\n—Henry Wadsworth Longfellow,\n"Evangeline"

name: Safe Haven
text: {2}, {T}: Exile target creature you control.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card exiled with Safe Haven to the battlefield under its owner's control.
